withSaving: Do you want to leave without saving? You will lose all the information in the form, are you sure you want to quit?
laComunidad: Let’s help each other make the best informed decision when it comes to renting a home.
eresInmobiliaria: Can I participate if I am a real estate agent?
eresPropietario: Can I participate if I am a landlord?
quieresDejarOpinion: Do you want to share your opinion about an apartment in this building?
tratoInmobiliaria: How did the real estate agent treat you?
tratoCasero: How did the landlord treat you?
respuestaProblema: What was the response when you reported a problem?
consejosInmobiliaria: What advice would you give to the real estate agent?
consejosCasero: What advice would you give to the landlord?
eligeUno: Choose one of the reasons and we will assess your complaint in detail
reportarReview: Is there any other reason you want to report this review for?
describeMotivo: What's the reason for reporting this review?
informacionAtaca: The information attacks a person directly.
lenguajeOfensivo: the review uses offensive language about a person or group because of their identity.
noHayOpiniones: There are no reviews yet for this building
hasVividoAqui: Have you lived here? let’s help each other make the best informed decision when it comes to renting a home.
recopilandoDatos: We are gathering data from the area. Encourage your friends and family to leave a review!
buscar: Search for an address in Barcelona
mesInicio: The start month cannot be later than the current month.
añoSalida: The starting year cannot be earlier than the starting year.
mesSalida: The month of departure cannot be later than the month of start-up
recomendariasVivienda: We need to know if you would recommend the home
necesitamosSaber: We need to know the name of the real estate agency
añadirComentario: Would you like to add a comment?
alMenosUnaOpcion: You must select at least one option
bajosNivelesRuido: Low noise levels, no crowds on the street
ambienteActivo: Active environment, with leisure activities and spaces to share.
ambienteAmigable: Friendly environment for families, schools, playgrounds...
zonaActiva: Active area during the evenings, due to the flow of people and/or locals.
sinAltercados: There are no disturbances in the area and I have never felt in danger.
algunAltercado: Some altercations during the day. Unsafe at night
altercadosOcasionales: Altercations are an occasional problem that is out of the norm
inseguro: It is unsafe to walk alone on the street and there are daily altercations.
queInmobiliaria: Which real estate company managed it?
